issue.title: [R] Windows build script tweaking for nightly packaging on GHA
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8179](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8179). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Following ARROW-7675. Nightly R packages are built on https://github.com/ursa-labs/arrow-r-nightly, and in porting that to use GHA too, some minor modifications are needed to the build scripts.
